title: On two families of Enriques categories over K3 surfaecs
abstract:
This article studies the moduli spaces of semistable objects related to two
families of Enriques categories over K3 surfaces, coming from quartic double
solids and special Gushel--Mukai threefolds. In particular, classic geometric
constructions are recovered in a modular way, such as the double EPW sextic and
cube associated with a general Gushel--Mukai surface, and the Beauville's
birational involution on the Hilbert scheme of two points on a quartic K3
surface. In addition, we describe the singular loci in some moduli spaces of
semistable objects and an explicit birational involutions on an O'Grady's
hyperk\"ahler tenfold.
